pr_title: Updated 3 error messages to replace the word 'matches' with 'match'

timeline.message: Updated 3 error messages to replace the word 'matches' with 'match'

timeline.bodyText: Can you please remove the extra blank space at CPU cores %d  and VM
timeline.author: GabrielBrascher

timeline.bodyText: Additionally, considering the fact that CPU cores is plural (of a CPU core) it should be "CPU cores do not match"
timeline.author: GabrielBrascher

replies.bodyText: Hi Gabriel,  Thank you very much for the review. I made the 2 changes as per the review. I will submit the pull request shortly.
replies.author: deargopinath

timeline.message:
fix grammar and blank space in error message

Thanks to Gabriel Brascher for the review.
